content:
ForteBank - Q1 2024 Financial Statement

BALANCE SHEET HIGHLIGHTS:
- Total Assets: 2800.00 billion KZT (growth: 0.0% YTD)
- Loans Portfolio: 1773.12 billion KZT (63.3% of total assets)
- Customer Deposits: 2075.92 billion KZT (74.1% of total assets)

INCOME STATEMENT:
- Net Profit: 45.45 billion KZT
- Return on Equity (ROE): 13.53%
- Return on Assets (ROA): 1.62%
- Net Interest Margin: 5.08%

CAPITAL & RISK METRICS:
- Capital Adequacy Ratio: 19.45% (Basel III requirement: 12.5%)
- Tier 1 Capital Ratio: 15.47%
- Non-Performing Loans (NPL) Ratio: 7.35%
- Loan Loss Coverage: 118.0%
- Cost-to-Income Ratio: 42.9%

LIQUIDITY:
- Liquidity Coverage Ratio (LCR): 158.7%
- Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR): 123.7%
- Loan-to-Deposit Ratio: 85.4%

The bank maintains strong capital buffers and healthy liquidity positions, demonstrating robust financial health in Q1 2024.

ForteBank - Q1 2024 Operational Metrics

NETWORK INFRASTRUCTURE:
- Total Branches: 147 locations nationwide
- ATM Network: 735 machines
- Self-Service Terminals: 929
- Employee Count: 3,381 professionals

CLIENT BASE:
- Total Active Clients: 540,965 customers
- Digital Banking Users: 324,579 (60.0% digitalization rate)
- New Clients This Quarter: 15,946
- Corporate Clients: 27,048
- Retail Clients: 513,916

DIGITAL BANKING PERFORMANCE:
- Mobile App Downloads: 386373
- Active Mobile Users: 227,576
- Online Transactions Volume: 7.9 million transactions
- Digital Transaction Share: 76.2% of all transactions
- Average Mobile App Rating: 4.7/5.0

PRODUCT PENETRATION:
- Cards Issued: 657,956 total cards
- Credit Cards: 246,093
- Debit Cards: 618,382
- Active Loan Accounts: 110,711
- Deposit Accounts: 378,923

EFFICIENCY METRICS:
- Transactions per Employee: 311 per day
- Average Service Time: 5.7 minutes
- Customer Satisfaction Score (NPS): 44
- Employee Productivity Index: 89.9%

ForteBank continues to expand its digital capabilities while maintaining a strong physical presence across Kazakhstan.

ForteBank - Q1 2024 Market Analysis & Strategic Overview

MARKET POSITION:
- Market Share by Assets: 12.73%
- Market Share by Loans: 12.55%
- Market Share by Deposits: 12.80%
- Ranking in Kazakhstan: #3

YEAR-OVER-YEAR COMPARISON:
- Asset Growth YoY: 9.5%
- Loan Portfolio Growth YoY: 18.1%
- Deposit Growth YoY: 11.0%
- Net Profit Growth YoY: 18.4%
- Client Base Growth YoY: 12.9%

COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES:
- Largest branch network nationwide with comprehensive coverage
- Strong capital position exceeding regulatory requirements
- Diversified loan portfolio across retail and corporate segments
- Advanced risk management systems
- High customer satisfaction and retention rates
- Trusted brand with 25+ years of market presence

BUSINESS SEGMENTS PERFORMANCE:
Retail Banking:
- Segment Profit: 21.55 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 1050.35 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 1169.33 billion KZT

Corporate Banking:
- Segment Profit: 16.58 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 703.84 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 705.61 billion KZT

SME Banking:
- Segment Profit: 8.20 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 138.37 billion KZT
- Active SME Clients: 56,079

STRATEGIC INITIATIVES Q1 2024:
- Network optimization and digital transformation
- Enhanced cybersecurity and fraud prevention systems
- Customer experience improvement across all channels
- Sustainable finance and ESG integration
- Partnership expansion with fintech companies

RISK MANAGEMENT OVERVIEW:
- Credit Risk: Well-diversified portfolio with prudent underwriting
- Market Risk: Limited exposure, effective hedging strategies
- Operational Risk: Robust controls and business continuity plans
- Compliance: Full adherence to Basel III and local regulations

OUTLOOK:
ForteBank is well-positioned for continued growth in the Kazakhstani banking market, supported by strong fundamentals, 
digital innovation, and commitment to customer value creation.
